title: Drinking Party
description: A wild night of partying awaits you! Experience +100 and Food -50%. Let loose, dance, and drink until the sun comes up. But be warned, the next morning might not be so pleasant.

title: Lucky Find
description: You are a lucky person and find +100 bottles!

title: Meet Colleagues
description: You meet your colleagues and collect +50 bottles!

title: Rat Bite
description: You were bitten by a rat! Food -20% and a risk of infection.

title: Glass Shard Injury
description: You accidentally cut yourself on a glass shard. Food -20% and a painful wound.

title: Tick Bite
description: You got bitten by a tick! Food -20% and a possibility of contracting a disease.

title: Dog Bite
description: A dog bit you while collecting bottles. Food -20% and a deep wound.

title: Slipped on a Banana Peel
description: You slipped on a banana peel! Food -20% and a bruised ego.

title: Mugged
description: You were mugged while collecting bottles. Food -20% and all your collected bottles were taken.

title: Helping Hand
description: A kind stranger helps you and gives you +50 bottles!

title: Hidden Treasure
description: You stumble upon a hidden treasure and collect +100 bottles!

title: Generous Donation
description: Someone donates +200 bottles to your collection!

title: Community Support
description: The local community rallies behind you and donates +500 bottles!
